appetizers.name: Broccoli Cheddar Soup
appetizers.description: Delicous Broccoli with cheddar cheese in a creamy robust soup!

coldSandwiches.name: BLT
coldSandwiches.description: Bacon, Lettuce, and Tomato between 2 pieces of delicous bread!

coldSandwiches.name: Turkey and Provolone
coldSandwiches.description: Turkey breast with rich provolone cheese, topped off with lettuce, tomato, and finally in our flaky fresh baked bread!

hotSandwiches.name: Ham and Cheese Melt
hotSandwiches.description: Classic Ham and Cheese Melt, best served with chips or a side of soup!

hotSandwiches.name: Chicken Parm Melt
hotSandwiches.description: Chicken Parmesan but wrapped between 2 pieces of bread and baked to perfection!

desserts.name: Chocolate Chip Cookie
desserts.description: A soft delicious chocolate chip cookie!

desserts.name: Vanilla Shake
desserts.description: Rich and Creamy Vanilla Shake topped with a delicous cherry!

drinks.name: Lemonade
drinks.description: A nice cold cup of fresh housemade lemonade! Not too sweet and not too sour!

drinks.name: Lemon Lime Soda
drinks.description: A ice cold cup of delectable lemon lime soda!
